introduction-to-nse2r

Aravind Hebbali and Lokesh Atreja

2019-11-19

Source: vignettes/introduction-to-nse2r.Rmd
introduction-to-nse2r.Rmd

NSE (National Stock Exchange) is the leading stock exchange of India, located in the city of Mumbai. While users can manually download data from NSE through a browser, importing this data into R is then cumbersome. The nse2r R package implements the retrieval of data from NSE and aims to reduce the pre-processing steps needed in analyzing such data.

nse2r is inspired by and a port of the Python package nsetools. The authors and contributors for this R package are not affiliated with NSE and NSE does not offer support for this R package.

With nse2r, you can fetch the following data related to:

  • stocks
    • quote for a given stock
    • symbol & name
    • check validity
    • most actively traded stocks in a month
    • 52 week high/low
    • top gainers/losers for the last trading session
  • index
    • list indices
    • check validity
    • fetch indices quote
  • futures & options
    • lot size
    • top gainers/losers for the last trading session
  • pre open data
    • nifty
    • nifty bank
    • nifty futures & options
  • indices advances & declines

Usage

nse2r uses consistent prefix nse_ for easy tab completion.

  • nse_index_ for index
  • nse_stock_ for stocks
  • nse_fo_ for futures and options
  • nse_preopen_ for preopen data
library(nse2r)

Stocks

Fetch most actively traded stocks in a month on NSE.

nse_stock_most_traded()
#> # A tibble: 12 x 6
#>    security              sharetotal trdQty nooftrades avgdailyturn turnover
#>    <chr>                      <dbl>  <dbl>      <dbl>        <dbl>    <dbl>
#>  1 Yes Bank Limited            4.73  74406   13096866         1779    35577
#>  2 State Bank Of India         3.59  10008    6338506         1352    27045
#>  3 Infosys Limited             3.54   3830    6962011         1333    26663
#>  4 Reliance Industries ~       3.03   1643    4045200         1140    22804
#>  5 Indiabulls Hsg Fin L~       2.98  10506   10458041         1121    22424
#>  6 ICICI Bank Limited          2.64   4474    4052944          995    19893
#>  7 Axis Bank Limited           2.38   2595    3254378          897    17947
#>  8 HDFC Bank Limited           2.23   1372    3587458          841    16823
#>  9 Indusind Bank Limited       2.23   1312    3544497          840    16807
#> 10 Tata Motors Limited         2.18  11681    4400657          821    16427
#> 11 TOTAL of Top Ten sec~      29.5  121827   59740558        11120   222410
#> 12 TOTAL                     100    408051  258720343        37647   752931

Fetch top gainers for the last trading session.

nse_stock_top_gainers()
#> # A tibble: 10 x 12
#>    symbol series lastCorpAnnounc~ lastCorpAnnounc~ openPrice highPrice
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>           <chr>                <dbl>     <dbl>
#>  1 BHART~ EQ     2019-04-23       Rights 19:67 @ ~      358.      396.
#>  2 INFRA~ EQ     2019-08-22       Interim Dividen~      204.      227.
#>  3 SBIN   EQ     2018-06-15       Annual General ~      312       324.
#>  4 GRASIM EQ     2019-08-08       Annual General ~      735       768 
#>  5 CIPLA  EQ     2019-07-31       Annual General ~      448       468.
#>  6 TATAS~ EQ     2019-07-04       Annual General ~      392       403 
#>  7 TATAM~ EQ     2016-07-18       Dividend - Re 0~      169       173.
#>  8 ULTRA~ EQ     2019-07-10       Annual General ~     4044.     4084 
#>  9 SUNPH~ EQ     2019-08-20       Annual General ~      413.      419.
#> 10 M&M    EQ     2019-07-18       Annual General ~      584.      591.
#> # ... with 6 more variables: lowPrice <dbl>, ltp <dbl>,
#> #   previousPrice <dbl>, netPrice <dbl>, tradedQuantity <dbl>,
#> #   turnoverInLakhs <dbl>

Fetch top losers for the last trading session.

nse_stock_top_losers()

#>    symbol series lastCorpAnnounc~ lastCorpAnnounc~ openPrice highPrice

#>  2 UPL    EQ     2019-07-02       Bonus 1:2             539       542.

#>  4 ITC    EQ     2019-05-22       Dividend - Rs 5~      254.      256.
#>  5 INDUS~ EQ     2019-08-08       Annual General ~     1377.     1388.
#>  6 VEDL   EQ     2019-07-04       Annual General ~      146.      146.
#>  7 COALI~ EQ     2019-08-09       Annual General ~      203.      204.
#>  8 MARUTI EQ     2019-08-14       Dividend - Rs 8~     7300      7359

#> # ... with 6 more variables: lowPrice <dbl>, ltp <dbl>,
#> #   previousPrice <dbl>, netPrice <dbl>, tradedQuantity <dbl>,
#> #   turnoverInLakhs <dbl>

Fetch stocks that have touched their 52 week highs during the day on NSE.

nse_stock_year_high()
#> # A tibble: 23 x 10
#>    symbol symbolDesc dt           value    year     ltp value_old    prev
#>    <chr>  <chr>      <date>       <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>     <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1 ABBOT~ Abbott In~ 2019-11-04 1.25e+4 1.25e+4 12382    12400    12043. 
#>  2 AGROP~ Agro Phos~ 2019-11-14 1.23e+2 1.23e+2   122.     123.     122. 
#>  3 ANKIT~ Ankit Met~ 2019-08-06 6.50e-1 6.50e-1     0.6      0.65     0.6
#>  4 BAJAJ~ Bajaj Fin~ 2019-11-14 9.14e+3 9.14e+3  9132.    9091     9062. 
#>  5 BANSW~ Banswara ~ 2018-11-16 1.02e+2 1.02e+2    91.8     99.3     89.1
#>  6 BHARA~ Bharat Ra~ 2019-11-08 7.02e+3 7.02e+3  6690.    6775.    6599. 
#>  7 CREDI~ CREDITACC~ 2019-11-14 7.77e+2 7.77e+2   767.     752      732. 
#>  8 DIXON  Dixon Tec~ 2019-11-14 3.38e+3 3.38e+3  3315.    3360.    3263. 
#>  9 FORTIS Fortis He~ 2019-11-11 1.61e+2 1.61e+2   145.     160.     156. 
#> 10 GMMPF~ GMM Pfaud~ 2019-11-14 1.73e+3 1.73e+3  1716.    1675.    1642. 
#> # ... with 13 more rows, and 2 more variables: change <dbl>, pChange <dbl>

Index

List NSE indices.

nse_index_list()
#> # A tibble: 55 x 1
#>    name             
#>    <chr>            
#>  1 NIFTY 50 Pre Open
#>  2 NIFTY 50         
#>  3 NIFTY NEXT 50    
#>  4 NIFTY100 LIQ 15  
#>  5 NIFTY BANK       
#>  6 INDIA VIX        
#>  7 NIFTY 100        
#>  8 NIFTY 500        
#>  9 NIFTY MIDCAP 100 
#> 10 NIFTY MIDCAP 50  
#> # ... with 45 more rows

NSE indices quote.

nse_index_quote()
#> # A tibble: 55 x 4
#>    name              lastPrice change pChange
#>    <chr>                 <dbl>  <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1 NIFTY 50 Pre Open   11904.   32.1     0.27
#>  2 NIFTY 50            11942.   70.4     0.59
#>  3 NIFTY NEXT 50       28266.   90.8     0.32
#>  4 NIFTY100 LIQ 15      3694.   24.4     0.66
#>  5 NIFTY BANK          31086.  336       1.09
#>  6 INDIA VIX              15.0  -0.68   -4.34
#>  7 NIFTY 100           12068    66.9     0.56
#>  8 NIFTY 500            9700.   49.6     0.51
#>  9 NIFTY MIDCAP 100    16832.   81.2     0.48
#> 10 NIFTY MIDCAP 50      4606.   33.4     0.73
#> # ... with 45 more rows

Check if index is valid.

nse_index_valid("nify 50")
#> [1] FALSE
nse_index_valid("nifty 50")
#> [1] TRUE

Futures & Options

Top futures and options gainers for the last trading session.

nse_fo_top_gainers()
#> # A tibble: 10 x 12
#>    symbol series lastCorpAnnounc~ lastCorpAnnounc~ openPrice highPrice

Preopen Data

Fetch data of pre open session of futures and options from NSE.

nse_preopen_fo()
#> # A tibble: 148 x 17
#>    symbol series xDt        caAct   iep   chn perChn   pCls trdQnty  iVal
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>     <chr> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>   <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 IDEA   EQ     NA         <NA>    2.7 -0.25  -8.47   2.95 2931259  79.1
#>  2 INFRA~ EQ     2019-08-22 INTE~ 204.  -4.7   -2.25 209.     30841  62.9
#>  3 DISHTV EQ     NA         <NA>   13.2 -0.2   -1.49  13.4    82837  10.9
#>  4 UNION~ EQ     NA         <NA>   51.6 -0.7   -1.34  52.3   110928  57.2
#>  5 SAIL   EQ     2019-08-22 ANNU~  36.8 -0.5   -1.34  37.3   156232  57.5
#>  6 BHART~ EQ     NA         <NA>  358.  -4.65  -1.28 362.    169271 606. 
#>  7 GLENM~ EQ     2019-09-19 ANNU~ 298.  15.8    5.58 282.     70812 211. 
#>  8 ASHOK~ EQ     NA         <NA>   82.9  3.9    4.94  79     399119 331. 
#>  9 TATAM~ EQ     NA         <NA>   78.5  1.85   2.41  76.6    32846  25.8
#> 10 SBIN   EQ     NA         <NA>  312    6      1.96 306     179165 559. 
#> # ... with 138 more rows, and 7 more variables: mktCap <dbl>, yHigh <dbl>,
#> #   yLow <dbl>, sumVal <dbl>, sumQnty <dbl>, finQnty <dbl>,
#> #   sumfinQnty <dbl>

Fetch data of pre open session of Nifty from NSE.

Advances & Declines

NSE indices advances & declines.

nse_advances_declines()
#> # A tibble: 57 x 4
#>    indice          advances declines unchanged
#>    <chr>              <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>
#>  1 NIFTY 50              28       22         0
#>  2 NIFTY NEXT 50         31       19         0
#>  3 NIFTY IT               8        2         0
#>  4 NIFTY BANK             9        3         0
#>  5 NIFTY MIDCAP 50       31       18         1
#>  6 NIFTY INFRA           17       13         0
#>  7 NIFTY REALTY           5        5         0
#>  8 NIFTY ENERGY           5        5         0
#>  9 NIFTY FMCG             9        6         0
#> 10 NIFTY MNC             19       11         0
#> # ... with 47 more rows
